---
name: Technical Debt
about: Track technical debt items that need to be addressed
title: '[Technical Debt]'
labels: technical-debt
assignees: ''
---

## Description
A clear and concise description of the technical debt item.

## Current State
Describe the current implementation or situation that represents the technical debt.

## Proposed Solution
Describe the proposed approach to address this technical debt.

## Impact
Describe the impact of addressing (or not addressing) this technical debt:
- Performance implications
- Maintainability concerns
- Risk factors
- Dependencies

## Additional info

## Requirements
